This method returns the 2D List of Strings that contains the sentences from the given text.
getSentenceLists(String) - Static method in class hw4.SentenceGenerator
This method is a static version of the SentenceGenerator.getSentenceLists() method and it does the same thing.

This method returns the 2D List of Strings that contains the sentences from the all of the text inside the given files.
